page.title: 15A day in the life of
page.content: I get up at 8.00am. I get dressed and go down stairs,put my weetabix cereal in the microwave.Then I have my drink of milk.I put my coat on and walk down to school.School starts 9.00am with assembly which is until 9.30am.We go down to school to start our shool work.This consists of maths,writing and handwriting.At 12.00am it's lunch time,We all have a packed lunch from home.After lunch we all play Poison,Football and Stag until 1.30pm. We work until 3.30.pm. When I get home I play in the back garden if the weather is fine.I have dinner at 5.00pm. After dinner I enjoy watching Hunter,Street Hawk and Eastenders. I am reading Robin of Sherwood and Fantastic Mr Fox at the moment. By Elizabeth Gist,Age 10.
